docs.snippet: Mike McCoy, the offensive coordinator for the Broncos who was a hot property on the coaching market, will replace Norv Turner as coach of the San Diego Chargers....

headline.main: Chargers Hire McCoy, Denver's Offensive Coordinator

headline.main: Sunk Costs: Mark Sanchez and the Concorde

docs.snippet: An autopsy showed that Kansas City Chiefs linebacker Jovan Belcher was drunk when he shot his girlfriend, Kasandra Perkins, and then killed himself last month in Missouri....
docs.lead_paragraph: An autopsy showed that Kansas City Chiefs linebacker Jovan Belcher was drunk when he shot his girlfriend, Kasandra Perkins, and then killed himself last month in Missouri.
docs.abstract: Autopsy reveals that Kansas City Chiefs linebacker Jovan Belcher was drunk when he shot his girlfriend Kasandra Perkins and then killed himself in Missouri.

docs.snippet: With receivers Roddy White, Julio Jones and tight end Tony Gonzalez at the disposal of quarterback Matt Ryan, Atlanta has a knack for coming up with big passing plays....
docs.lead_paragraph: With receivers Roddy White, Julio Jones and tight end Tony Gonzalez at the disposal of quarterback Matt Ryan, Atlanta has a knack for coming up with big passing plays.
docs.abstract: Atlanta Falcons, who are preparing to face San Fransisco 49ers in NFC title game, have one of the most explosive offenses in NFL; quarterback Matt Ryan's completion rate on passes of more than 20 yards is tops among remaining playoff quarterbacks.

headline.seo: N.F.C. — Falcons’ Offense Relies on Long Ball
headline.main: Falcons’ Offense Makes a Habit of Going for the Long Ball
headline.print_headline: Falcons’ Offense Makes a Habit of the Long Ball

docs.snippet: Michael Hoomanawanui appeared in 14 games during the regular season, missing two with a concussion, then stepped in for the injured Rob Gronkowski in the Patriots’ win over the Texans....
docs.lead_paragraph: Michael Hoomanawanui appeared in 14 games during the regular season, missing two with a concussion, then stepped in for the injured Rob Gronkowski in the Patriots’ win over the Texans.
docs.abstract: New England Patriots, who are preparing to face Baltimore Ravens in AFC title game, will rely on tight end Michael Hoomanawanui for the rest of postseason to replace injured tight end Rob Gronkowski.

headline.seo: Michael Hoomanawanui Eager to Help the Patriots
headline.main: Tight End Eager to Help Suddenly Has a Job to Do
headline.print_headline: Tight End Eager to Help Suddenly Has a Job to Do

docs.snippet: The Ravens distanced themselves from a linebacker’s comments about the Patriots’ offense ahead of the A.F.C. title game, which they lost to New England last year, 23-20....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Ravens distanced themselves from a linebacker’s comments about the Patriots’ offense ahead of the A.F.C. title game, which they lost to New England last year, 23-20.
docs.abstract: Baltimore Ravens are preparing to once again face New England Patriots in AFC title game.

headline.seo: Ravens Turn Focus to Avenging Loss to Patriots That Still Stings
headline.main: Ravens Want Revenge to Come From Winning, Not Words
headline.print_headline: Ravens Want Revenge to Come From Winning, Not Words

docs.snippet: Notre Dame running back Cierre Wood will not be back for his final year of eligibility and will enter the N.F.L. draft....

docs.abstract: Notre Dame running back Cierre Wood will enter the 2013 NFL draft rather than returning for his final year of eligibility; other college football news noted.

headline.main: Notre Dame Running Back Going Pro

docs.snippet: At a luncheon for the New York Building Congress, Joseph J. Lhota, the former chief of the Metropolitan Transportation Authority, more than hinted at his intention to run for mayor....
docs.lead_paragraph: At a luncheon for the New York Building Congress, Joseph J. Lhota, the former chief of the Metropolitan Transportation Authority, more than hinted at his intention to run for mayor.
docs.abstract: Joseph J Lhota, former Metropolitan Transportation Authority chair, suggests at business luncheon that he will probably enter New York City's 2013 mayoral race; no formal timetable has been set for announcing his candidacy, but an adviser says Lhota has been meeting with potential donors and Republican public officials about the contours and contents of a citywide run.

headline.seo: Ex-M.T.A. Chief Lhota Talks Up Mayor’s Race
headline.main: Lhota, at Business Luncheon, Talks Up ’13 Race for Mayor
headline.print_headline: Lhota, at Business Luncheon, Talks Up ’13 Race for Mayor

docs.snippet: Kevin O’Neill was fired as Southern California’s basketball coach after three and a half years during which he failed to turn around a program weighed down by N.C.A.A. issues that preceded his arrival....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kevin O’Neill was fired as Southern California’s basketball coach after three and a half years during which he failed to turn around a program weighed down by N.C.A.A. issues that preceded his arrival.
docs.abstract: Southern California fires men's basketball coach Kevin O'Neill for failing to turn around program weighed down by NCAA issues that preceded his arrival.
